name: Gauntlet of Fire
description:
This is Matejs the magician in training. He learned how to cast fireball and immediately declared himself the greatest wizard of all time. After insulting everyone in Trijamia with his attitude, Matejs finds himself in a trial by combat. Can you defend his status as the greatest wizard of all time?

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys for movement. Right click your left mouse button to charge your attack. Release the button to launch a fireball. Careful! If you charge up too long, you might self-immolate.

Music: NegativeZero (royalstove)

Art and Sound: Zuratu

Code: Timmay

Stream: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/691116353
